import React, {useState} from 'react';
import { useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/core';
import { StyleSheet, View, Image, Text, TouchableOpacity, TextInput} from 'react-native';
import { auth } from '../../../firebase';
import { Entypo } from '@expo/vector-icons'; 
import NavBar from '../../components/NavBar'
import ImageGiant from '../../components/ImageGiant'

export default function Home(){
    return(
        <View style={{flex:1}}>
            <View>
                <NavBar/>
            </View>
            <View style = {{flex:1 ,backgroundColor:"#F3F3F3",flexDirection:'row'}}>
                <View style = {{width:'20%', backgroundColor:'blue'}}>
                    <ImageGiant/>
                </View>
                <View style = {{flex:1, flexDirection:'column'}}>
                        <View style ={{backgroundColor:'yellow', height:'20%', paddingTop:'5%'}}>
                                <Text style = {{fontSize:30, fontWeight:'bold', color:'#3E6097', textAlign:'center'}}>Suas Músicas Mais Tocadas</Text>
                                <View style={{paddingTop:20}}></View>
                                <Text style = {{fontSize:18, color:'#374754', textAlign:'center'}}>Selecionamos as músicas que você mais escutou nos últimos dias. Escute, agora mesmo, suas músicas do momento!</Text>
                        </View>
                        <View style = {{backgroundColor:'purple', height:'80%', alignItems:'center', justifyContent:'center', flexDirection:'row'}}>
                            <View style = {{backgroundColor:'gray', width:'15%', height:'80%', flexDirection:'column'}}>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Nome
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    No time to die
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    No time to die
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    No time to die
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    No time to die
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    No time to die
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    No time to die
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    No time to die
                                </Text>
                            </View>
                            <View style = {{backgroundColor:'gray', width:'15%', height:'80%', flexDirection:'column'}}>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Artista
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Billie Eilish
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Billie Eilish
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Billie Eilish
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Billie Eilish
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Billie Eilish
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Billie Eilish
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Billie Eilish
                                </Text>
                            </View>
                            <View style = {{backgroundColor:'gray', width:'15%', height:'80%', flexDirection:'column'}}>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Vezes Tocadas
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    500
                                </Text >
                            </View>
                            <View style = {{backgroundColor:'gray', width:'15%', height:'80%', flexDirection:'column'}}>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Duração
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    3:21
                                </Text>
                            </View>
                            <View style = {{backgroundColor:'gray', width:'15%', height:'80%', flexDirection:'column'}}>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    Descrição
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{textAlign:'center'}}>
                                    ...
                                </Text>
                            </View>
                            
                        </View>
                </View>
                <View style = {{width:'20%', backgroundColor:'green'}}>

                </View>
            </View>
        </View>
    );
}
